post/2021/Our cats give me more reason to use the terminal

summary
date

2021-07-05
tags

note/2021
posse
banner

…/assets/cover-2021-07-05_1721567582112_0.jpg
banner-caption

the cats help identify orphan notes in an Obsidian.md vault graph

Trying to use the mouse? Play a video game? Look at your Obsidian graph? Experiment with the Logseq /draw command? The cats are there to help.

Do I mind? Not a bit. Keeps me in the terminal. Helpful for focus. Though I sometimes wish they weren’t quite so helpful with the video games.

They’re just doing their part!

Notes written in Logseq and published with Eleventy.
